categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave VIII

nodes.text: The TIE/fo Fighter Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features a detailed miniature of the TIE/fo space superiority fighter from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was released on December 17, 2015 as part of the game's eighth wave of expansions.

Following the traditions of the Galactic Empire, the First Order has kept the TIE fighter design in service, but has updated the craft to modern combat standards. The TIE/fo Fighter Expansion Pack allows you to reinforce your X-Wing™ squadron with one of these modern First Order TIEs. In addition to its detailed, pre-painted TIE/fo fighter miniature, you'll find six ship cards, two new upgrades, a maneuver dial, and all the tokens you need to fly your TIE into battle!
The TIE/fo Fighter Expansion Pack contains one miniature, plus two maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
